titles.title: Small Business and Family Health Tax Relief Act of 2017
Small Business and Family Health Tax Relief Act of 2017
A bill to delay the annual fee on health insurance providers until 2020 and to make such fee tax deductible.

action.text: Read twice and referred to the Committee on Finance.

bill.summary: Small Business and Family Health Tax Relief Act of 2017This bill suspends the annual fee imposed on health-insurance providers under the Patient Protection and Affordable Care Act for 2019 and makes the fee tax-deductible beginning in 2020.
